headline: Buried power lines are reducing storm-related outages for Dominion Energy Virginia customers
summary: RICHMOND, Va., June 02, 2025--As the Atlantic hurricane season begins, Dominion Energy has finished burying more than 2,500 miles of the most outage-prone power lines in Virginia. Burying these lines significantly reduces power outages and restoration time during storms.

headline: Here's Why Dominion Energy (D) is a Strong Momentum Stock
summary: The Zacks Style Scores offers investors a way to easily find top-rated stocks based on their investing style. Here's why you should take advantage.
